 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזַר‎</span>] **verb** ==dedicate, consecrate==, (compare [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 118</sup>), separate, in relig. and ceremonial sense (Late Hebrew only as denominative, compare II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נזר‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***make a vow***, compare [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 117 f.</sup>, [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>i. 463 f.</sup>, 2d ed. 482 f.; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נדֿר‎</span> ***vow*** [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>ZMG xxii (1868), 196 Min.</sup> ***id.***, [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Südar. Chrest. 128</sup>; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְדַד‎</span>, ***vow***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nazâru***</u></abbr>, ***curse*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 457</sup>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָּזֵר‎</span> [[Ezek.14.7|Ezek 14:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִנָּזֵר‎</span> [[Lev.22.2|Lev 22:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּנָָּֽזְרוּ‎</span> [[Hos.9.10|Hos 9:10]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנָּזֵר‎</span> [[Zech.7.3|Zech 7:3]] — ***devote, dedicate oneself*** unto (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבּשֶׁת‎</span>, i.e. Ba\`al [[Hos.9.10|Hos 9:10]] from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ezek.14.7|Ezek 14:7]] (of apostasy); ***hold sacredly aloof*** from, (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) [[Lev.22.2|Lev 22:2]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); absolute [[Zech.7.3|Zech 7:3]] ***consecrating my(self )***, i.e. by fasting. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִטֻּמְאָתָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִזֵּרְתֶּם אֶתבְּֿנֵייִֿשׂ‎</span> [[Lev.15.31|Lev 15:31]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***and ye shall keep the sons of Israel sacredly separate from their uncleanness*** (but read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִזְהַרְתָּם‎</span> ***warn*** away from — as [[Ezek.3.18|Ezek 3:18]]; [[Ezek.33.8|Ezek 33:8]]; [[Ezek.33.9|Ezek 33:9]], — so [[BDB#Sam|⅏]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] — as to sense — [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Kau|Kau]]). — See also II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזַר‎</span>]. 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזַר‎</span>] **verb denominative Hiph\`il** ***be a Nazirite, live as Nazirite***, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> (abstaining) ***from*** (so Late Hebrew); — only [[Num.6|Num 6]] in law of Naz.: ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִזִּיר לי‎</span> consecutive v[[Lev.25.12|Lev 25:12]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַזִּיר לי‎</span> v[[Lev.25.5|Lev 25:5]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיַּיִן ֗֗֗ יַזִּיר‎</span> v[[Lev.25.3|Lev 25:3]] ***from wine. . . he shall abstain as a Nazirite; Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַזּיר לְי‎</span> v[[Lev.25.2|Lev 25:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלָיְֿמֵי הַזּירוֺ לי‎</span> v[[Lev.25.6|Lev 25:6]].
